offering: UCARI offers at-home intolerance testing kits for people and pets, empowering individuals to proactively manage their health by identifying food, environmental, and chemical intolerances.
target_markets: Health-conscious individuals, pet owners, fitness enthusiasts, holistic health practitioners, nutritionists, and retailers in the wellness and pet care industries.
competitors: 5Strands, Everlywell, Check My Body Health, Modern Allergy Management
additional_details: UCARI's mission is to help people and pets live healthier lives by providing actionable insights through affordable, accessible testing. UCARI emphasizes education, empowerment, and ongoing wellness.
